ticket.title: Bug at installing ActiveRecord RI on a Winows machine
ticket.original-body:
I'm using Windows Vista, and when I was recently updating my gems I had this error:
Installing ri documentation for activerecord-3.0.5... ERROR: While generating documentation for activerecord-3.0.5 ... MESSAGE: Invalid argument - ./</cdesc-<.ri ... RDOC args: --ri --op c:/rubies/Ruby192-p136/lib/ruby/gems/1.9.1/doc/activerecord-3.0.5/ri --main README.rdoc lib README.rdoc --title --quiet

... MESSAGE: Invalid argument - ./</cdesc-<.ri ... RDOC args: --ri --op c:/rubies/Ruby192-p136/lib/ruby/gems/1.9.1/doc/activerecord-3.0.5/ri --main README.rdoc lib README.rdoc --title --quiet
